core:LON.description: longitude, check/ask two conventions in imma1 doc

core:VI.description: visibility indic. ICOADS.C0.VI not found in new set

core:SI.description: SST measurement method, table not like original, nor like in doc

c1:BSI.description: box system indicator. Currently not in use

c5:TR.description: duration of period of reference for amount of precipitation

c5:QI1.description: QC indicator for height of clouds

c5:QI10.description: QC indicator for sea surface temperature

c5:QI11.description: QC indicator for period of wind waves of of measured waves

c5:QI12.description: QC indicator for height of wind waves of of measured waves

c5:QI15.description: QC indicator for characteristic of pressure tendency

c5:QI16.description: QC indicator for amount of pressure tendency

c5:QI17.description: QC indicator for true direction of ship

c5:QI18.description: QC indicator for ship's average speed

c5:SLL.description: max height of cargo above summer load line

c5:SLHH.description: departure of summer max load line from sea level

c5:QI23.description: QC indicator for course over ground

c5:QI24.description: QC indicator for speed over ground

c5:QI28.description: QC indicator for relative wind direction

c5:QI29.description: QC indicator for relative wind speed

c8:OPCV.description: partial pressure of carbon dioxide value

c8:OPCZ.description: partial pressure of carbon dioxide depth

c99:QC_AirT.description: Quality control flag for Air temp

c99:QC_Wsp.description: Quality control flag for Wind Speed

c99:WDir.description: Wind direction relative to true North

c99:QC_WD.description: Quality control flag for Wind direction

c99:QC_RH.description: Quality control flag for relative humidity
